articles.author: Alexa St. John, Nora Naughton
articles.title: China doesn't want American cars anymore. That's a problem. - Business Insider
articles.description: Chinese automakers are giving US car companies a run for their money — and that's forcing Ford and GM to make some hard decisions about their futures.
articles.content: Chinese automakers are giving US car companies a run for their money, especially as the momentum behind electric vehicles accelerates  and that could force the likes of Ford and GM to make some hard … [+3403 chars]
